metadata.Title: CVE-2022-39176 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
BlueZ before 5.59 allows physically proximate attackers to obtain sensitive information because profiles/audio/avrcp.c does not validate params_len.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-39176` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

bluetooth - 5.65-0ubuntu1
bluez - 5.65-0ubuntu1
bluez-cups - 5.65-0ubuntu1
bluez-hcidump - 5.65-0ubuntu1
bluez-meshd - 5.65-0ubuntu1
bluez-obexd - 5.65-0ubuntu1
bluez-tests - 5.65-0ubuntu1
libbluetooth3 - 5.65-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

notes.Note: rodrigo-zaiden> this and CVE-2022-39177 tracked in same LP bug

criterions.comment: bluez package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.65-0ubuntu1').
